movie.title: Brotherhood
movie.plot: In 1926, a band of teenage boys arrive at Long Point Camp for the adventure of their lives. When their canoe capsizes in a freak summer storm, their holiday descends into a soul-shuddering fight for survival.

events.title: a canoe capsizes at summer camp on Balsam Lake, drowning 11 children
